doc.after: Historical subsistence and sport hunting techniques can differ radically with modern hunting regulations often addressing issues of where when and how hunts are conducted Techniques may vary depending on government regulations a hunter s personal ethics local custom hunting equipment and the animal being hunted Often a hunter will use a combination of more than one technique Laws may forbid sport hunters from using some methods used primarily in poaching and wildlife management
